column3:
Vuyargur has a task for you that he cannot delegate.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Deliver the Chirwagur payment to the charitable Chirwagur in Solace.
Deliver the Chirwagur salt to Vuyargur.
Salt is vital to our operations—both to grit icy paths and preserve food—and it is high time that we replenished our stocks. Unfortunately, we have encountered a minor issue...
Our Chirwagur supplier has requested you by name. Would you be willing to complete the trade in our stead?
My thanks. You should find him to the northwest of Worlar's Echo. All you need do is hand over this talisman in exchange for the salt. And...stay on your guard.
It is you—good. I waited. We trade salt for talisman.
Talisman will be buried in saltern. Even greater divine blessing.
Do you...remember me? I was with Vorporlor. Traded crystal with Nopli. Now, we meet again.
You go to snow mountain with Yok Huy. Why?
How is work on snow mountain?
You are strange. <chuckle> Always involve self. Always interesting stories.
My kin will not meet outsiders. But you are interesting. To you, I will trade the divine blessing.
Here. Salt. Let us trade again. The divine blessing for your stories.
Ah, you are returned! Did the trade go as planned?
My thanks. Chirwagur salt is the finest around, but they bear us a great deal of hostility. Negotiations are often a fraught affair...
Though it seems they have placed their trust in you, <Split(<Highlight>ObjectParameter(1)</Highlight>, ,1)/>. I hope I can count on your diplomatic dealings should they request your presence again!
